They're great reliable little point and shoot cameras.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX50
Reviews.Author: Mike "Big Daddy Rat"
Reviews.Content: I needed an affordable compact digital camera for the wife and I, and this camera is a great combination of ease of use for her and still has the serious control settings I like. I think the picture quality is very good for the price

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the camera and am getting better working I was surprised  there was not instruction manual with how to use the camera in every mode

Reviews.Title: Great, Camera, Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Teresa1981
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research to find a digital camera with a macro setting and high pixels—this is the one! It's slim and lightweight. The picture quality is terrific. The price is awesome. I had a Coolpix but this camera is so much nicer for the less money. I would definitely recommend this camera if you're in the market.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: cindylu
Reviews.Content: Nice Camera, still learning all the options, there are lots.  There was an issue with delivery, they had no black in stock and emailed me to let me know there would be a delay unless I wanted another color.  Once mailed there was issue b/c no weekend service so, took some time to get the camera but, well worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX50
Reviews.Author: Game Addict
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase the "Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX50" after watching a review on "c-net.com"; These Sony Cyber-shot is simple to use and affordable.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHOTOS!
Reviews.Author: Wolfette
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a point and shoot camera that doesn't compromise picture quality.  Took this to Italy with me and was able to capture all the intricate details and myriad of colors at the Vatican, Basilicas, and Pantheon like I have never experienced with other cameras.  I was so happy with this product especially considering the affordable price.  Definitely a GREAT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Xavier F.
Reviews.Content: I like it. Easy to use and very good photos. More small that i image. I recomended it. Good price.

Reviews.Title: simple fun and great photos
Reviews.Author: jmg
Reviews.Content: bought this for my son and he is loving it. It's very small an yet takes a great photo. simple to use with some fun features. wish they offered option to buy case for it and memory card all at once.

Reviews.Title: so far so goo
Reviews.Author: David T. Koski
Reviews.Content: great little inexpensive camera for the money; better than a cell phone photo and easy to use. i like it

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Knight
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera. I have had no issues with it yet. I purchased it to take videos of my baby and it has worked great for that purpose.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre pictures and not many of them
Reviews.Author: Phillip W. Trimbath
Reviews.Content: For A hundred dollars I know you're not going to get great pictures, and that was true of this camera. The really disappointing feature is the battery. If you're going out for a day of photography, you better have two or three batteries, and charge them all for the next day. The battery life is non-existent.

Reviews.Title: LCD screen going BAD
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Photographs are nice, good quality color and is easy to use. In my first trip using this camera and handling it VERY carefully the LCD panel started to go bad, lost its brightness and now is going white, a horizontal line across the display started getting more visible. VERY annoying, its like pointing in a very foggy day!! Returned it.

Reviews.Title: Not!
Reviews.Author: Michele Wallace
Reviews.Content: Camera took good pictures but broke after 2 weeks!!  Little door that holds memory card in broke and would not stay closed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Kyle Pack
Reviews.Content: As a professional photographer, I am pretty picky when it comes to cameras.  I bought this for an upcoming trip, as I don't want to haul my DSLR all over Prague.  I've only played with this camera for a few hours, but the photographs look awesome!  I'm usually not a fan of "in camera effects", but I am loving some of the extras that this camera comes with.  The only downside is that you have very little control over the settings, but the camera is smarter than even most professionals the majority of the time anyway.  If you are looking for a camera that takes great pics and fits in your pocket.  This is the one!

Reviews.Title: Clarity Issue
Reviews.Author: K. Butler "Number1Grammy"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my pictures of scenery as I just returned from vacation and they all came out fairly well. However, all the photos I take of my grandchildren seem to be fuzzy looking . I've tried Intelligent Auto and Superior Auto and I'm still not satisfied with the results. I even stopped using the flash. Any suggestions for best settings? (also used soft skin effect as I don't know which other option would be best for portraits)

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: koyamike
Reviews.Content: As ratings state, this is a little camera with a lot of good features...like the WX9. Takes great pictures and is fast. Controls are small but can be worked effectively.

Reviews.Title: perfect peice
Reviews.Author: Abhinav Sinha
Reviews.Content: this is a very small and compact peice very easy to handle in holidays and every day function instead of big

Reviews.Title: good point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Shuvro
Reviews.Content: This one i choose as a gift for my friend.. it is one of the low reasonable priced cameras. but the night photo shoots are exceptional.. the details in the night photos are great. also the day light photography is perfect... it is very handy for its size and weight....

Reviews.Title: amazing piece of technology!!!
Reviews.Author: just me
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!!!!! Such a wonderful value for an awesome piece of technology!!! many different settings to choose from, I just keep it on auto detect and it knows what to do..... everything is clear, amazing print quality!!!! love this camera sooooo much!!!! a great investment for me!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: -=®=-
Reviews.Content: The pictures this camera takes are beautiful, it has several options to ensure that the picture will be great. Combined with a good flash memory card it records great HD videos. This camera is great and cheap!

Reviews.Title: Great camera sold by seller with clear pictures
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Harris
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, pictures are so clear and there's nothing bad about this camera. It's a great product sold.

Reviews.Title: It's working really good far away
Reviews.Author: Angelique
Reviews.Content: I always buy second hand cameras, I love this one, it's a really good camera and it's almost new I mean it has no scratches at all and it works perfectly! I am glad to get this product!

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: C. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Nice size screen.  Except for the thumb wheel which has an inconvenient location the controls are great.  The Camer is just what we needed.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Bradford R. Sanders
Reviews.Content: It is just an awesome camera. Takes great photos. Has awesome features. One of the best cameras that I ever owned!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: M. Woods
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! I have a larger Fuji and wanted something smaller and more convenient this camera fits that perfect. I haven't had much time to really get into this camera but for the point and shoot it is AWESOME! The blur function is really good too!

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing little camera, and I do mean little - it's very compact.I went on snapsort.com to find a camera expecting to pay several hundred dollars, but this one out-scored the vast majority of them - there was one I would really have liked, but going on vacation, I don't want to lug around a huge camera and case and accessories.This one you can slip in your pocket and use it for anything from 3D panoramas to HD video.The features are as indepth or as basic as you want to go. It can take great snapshots if thats all you want it for, or you can get as artistic and technical as you need.While it doesn't really have a manual mode, once you get familiar with the different modes and adjusting the EVs, you can customize your shots far better than a manual camera.The software is incredible, as it will take several shots and create the best picture from the data in all of them - it's incredible once you understand how it works and what works best in the different situations.I got a cheap 64gb SDXC card and at 16MP it will hold over 10,000 shots, and 5mp will hold 23,000 shots.I also picked up a couple of batteries and a charger pretty cheaply (around $22, and it would have been 150 through Sony).

Reviews.Title: Great, but stopped charging after a month. Had to ship for repair!
Reviews.Author: lauren
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a birthday/Christmas gift and loved it! It has tons of features and a great zoom, which is what I really need for pictures of animals!Con: Camera would not charge after about a month. I had to ship to the repair center ($10) and wait for it to come back (15 days total). Now it works great though, and they sent me 2 new chargers. (I had to call and ask for them)Con: I can't figure out for to get video to my computer. The format that I am seeing the videos in is not recognized my by computer. So now I have a full SD card with videos that can only be watched from my camera and have yet to figure out a solution. I am hoping it is just user error!

Reviews.Title: bought 3 of them
Reviews.Author: elden2010
Reviews.Content: One for own usage one year ago, when it was like $180. Two as gifts, for family members, $110 around.Neat and pretty.  Good pictures taken easily. It indeed has one shortcoming, slow to power on/start to shoot, as it need two or three seconds to pop out the lens.  So you cannot reply on it as fast shooter.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: keith w.
Reviews.Content: Great little camera fits in front pocket rechargeable battery built in highly recommended if you want a little camera look no further

Reviews.Title: A great camera
Reviews.Author: SteveZL1
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for only a few weeks and it is just fantastic. This is my 1st digital camera and I love it. I checked out CNET for low cost digital cameras and this one had a great review. The pictures I have taken have been great. I'm still learning the ins & outs of it...and it just keeps getting better. I ordered the bundle and it arrived in a timely way. Free shipping. I had a friend set things up for me and I'll tell you I don't know how I got along w/out it. I'm a car guy and if I see a nice older car or one for sale I just stop and snap away and have great pictures. I'm anxious to take it to the next car show I attend. The zoom is nice. Most every picture I've taken has been wonderful. The only setback was from my error. All and all a great camera for a great price.

Reviews.Title: small camera
Reviews.Author: Lou Ann Burress
Reviews.Content: Great size, easy to use.  Was great to use when on vacation and didn't want to carry our larger camera.  Only the on/off switch was very sensitive and I had to be careful not to touch it.

Reviews.Title: Best pics
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife and she loves it. I also purchased a hx 200 v a couple of weeks later. Sony out does my Nikon L810.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures and love the size!
Reviews.Author: Tall
Reviews.Content: I have had a digital camera before and was not happy with the quality of pictures, or the size.  This one is the opposite!  I love this camera!  It is small and compact and takes delightful, clear, crisp pictures.  I especially like the fact that there is not a sizable delay once focused and then taking the picture.  So often pictures would be blurred with my other camera.  This one is just great and would recommend to the novice photographer!

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Pramod D.
Reviews.Content: nice in look,great features and really compact.considering the price, i think its a good buy. I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: bdffouse69
Reviews.Content: Sony makes a good camera. This is the third camera we have owned and it is awesome. I like it alot, and would reccommend it.

Reviews.Title: great camera! affordable price!
Reviews.Author: UGYN
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my mother in-law. before we give it as a gift my wife open it and make some testing. we both amazed because this camera can take a great picture like those more expensive model camera. I recommended this camera... very sharp and affordable camera.

Reviews.Title: Great photos and very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Deepak Gupta
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my aunt as she wanted to replace her existing sony camera which had got damaged. It takes great photos and the panoramic feature is a fantastic feature. Like all Sony cameras it is very easy to use and takes great photos. Would easily recommend it to others, especially at the price at which we bought it, just a little over $110.

Reviews.Title: Crisp pictures.
Reviews.Author: DGator
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera mainly to use as a Vlogging camera. I did my research and chose this one. When taking video it is crisp, clean and smooth, the audio is fantastic for a compact camera. For taking stills I get the same result, crisp, clean pictures. I am very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Eric Gross
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter, so please understand that when reading this very brief review. She has owned several cameras over the last several years: a Lumix and a Canon. She greatly prefers this little Sony to those cameras. In the first week she took over 400 pictures with it. She is a terrific photographer and works in the punk community. She has told me that the quality of the images has been consistently terrific and she has loved several of the camera's special effects options.

Reviews.Title: A Sure Shot - Easy to Use Camera
Reviews.Author: Gina Novelle at Fast Furious Computing
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. After 10 years, my Sony Mavica died; yeah the one that used floppy diskettes. I was forced to purchase a new camera.I did some research online, and settled on Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX50 16.2 MP, Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model). I thought about buying the latest and greatest, but why pay for something I may not use?Of course, coming from the monster size of the Mavica, I was a bit shocked at the tiny package of this camera, but the LCD screen at almost 3 inches was a sure-fire plus.This camera has everything I loved about my old Sony Mavica, and because the menu system was familiar, I was up and running in a few minutes. I did have to read about the upload to my computer procedures.  However, my machine already had the software (I have a Sony laptop), as this camera defaulted the upload using the Sony Picture software.The YouTube review was spot-on. This camera takes beautiful video 30 minutes unattended. I am happy to say, it also takes gorgeous still shots (which are still my specialty.)  It was well packed, and came on time. Focus Camera (the third party vendor on Amazon) communicated with me even after the sale.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: JUAN DIEGO HENAO G.
Reviews.Content: Very fast and easy to use.  I trully recomend this product. I used to have a Samsung one, water proof but it's very bad.  The worse

Reviews.Title: Great camera on the cheap
Reviews.Author: PabloFenixx
Reviews.Content: I bought the sony Cyber-shot to take with me while I'm living abroad, and so far it works great. Mind you, I'm not trying to take professional photos, just something to send back to my family and show them I'm alive and doing things.The only problem I have had with the camera is that sometimes pictures are constantly blurry, even with the shortest shutter setting and resting it on a solid surface. But, I think this may be more a problem with the settings I changed than with the actual camera because it doesn't happen all the time. If you want to use the other settings, maybe do what I didn't and read the manual!

Reviews.Title: an amazing little camera-
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey R. Bissell
Reviews.Content: Well-just opened and set the camera up. I have at least 8 cameras and this is really amazing. I guess the slr's are better, but this is pretty close for a small compact. I mean small! You could lose this in a suit pocket! Anyway I shot it in many functions -it is allot like the Sony NEX 3 I have, menu wise. Pretty intuitive. It also shoots great macro shots-also very close to my 60d Canon with a 1.8 50mm on it-also amazing. The new technology Sony is developing is so far out there just in 1 year. Low light it's good set at 800iso. Did some pixel peeking and the shots were very good-you need to push the camera and explore the settings.I shoot without flash whenever possible, and the colors are quite true. This will be with me quite a bit-probably in my carry bag all the time. Put a light wrist cord on it as it's that small to hold. Less than 100.00 and it beats cameras up to 500.00. I checked them out by doing the wx50vsother cameras in google. There are not many that beat it for sharpness and overall performance. It is a well kept secret. Wish you could see the shots-I'll put some on flicker-Jeff Bissell-take a look. Was bought on Amazon-they are good at any returns within 30 days.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Pat Molloy
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, so easy to use! Price is right and so lightweight. I would recommend this camera for anyone. Can't wait to use it at my Grandson's College Graduation this weekend!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera that fits in your pocket.
Reviews.Author: mervstar
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a vacation to Vietnam.  Great little camera!  I'm thinking about buying another.  Oh,  It also survived my four year old nephew's repeated attempts to "play with it" so you know it's tough.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Carrie Abrahamsen
Reviews.Content: Sleek, lightweight, turns on and off quickly, takes great video (with sound), self timer, lots of features and settings, and a wonderful price.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lisa Balsley
Reviews.Content: I love the panaromaic (I know I misspelled it sorry) view and I love how its easy to use! I am still getting used to it but I love it regardless. I buy Sony camera every time

Reviews.Title: Good pics, a little bulky
Reviews.Author: Evette
Reviews.Content: In this day and age of slimmer and lighter is better, this camera is a bit bulky. However, it takes great pics and has a 3D function as well.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Dimitri
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, fast, very small and clever on the on automatic settings. very pleased with this item.But has some minuses:1.battery is discharged almost without signal so it's difficult to determine when you need to charge it.2.picture is a bit blurred when approaching

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Brian C.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother.  It is reasonably priced and does everything she needs a camera to do.  No issues.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product for the money...
Reviews.Author: Gypsygirl
Reviews.Content: Great size, pictures and uses zeiss lens.  Perfect for travel, easy to use and would recommend to anyone looking for a good camera and product.  Use photo's on professional book covers.  love the product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Adam Duer
Reviews.Content: This camera is the perfect size and takes excellent pictures.  The features on the camera also set it apart.  I look forward to going on trips and having it in my pocket!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, good battery life, customization themes
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for what I need it for. I am very happy with the quality and the features. Shoots full 1080p video and 4k still photos. I use a micro sd card in it with the adapter and use my phone to import photos i want to share. Works great with Android phones with micro my 16gb sd card. I no longer need to get to a computer to share photos, but when i do works fine. Different themes to choose from and many features to get the right shot,

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera and Price
Reviews.Author: Steven Chau
Reviews.Content: This camera is fabulous.  Takes great images and video as well.  The camera is very tiny and compact and even smaller in width and length than my phone.  Wouldn't expect anything less from  a product by Sony.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: toobad "toobad"
Reviews.Content: This takes really good pictures and a very good battery life. With the mini usb I can charge the camera with my phone cord. The buttons are kind of small.

Reviews.Title: Pleasant surprise
Reviews.Author: Cenf
Reviews.Content: Over the past few years we have owned a number of lower priced digital cameras. This one is by far the best, both in ease of use and quality of pictures. The zoom is better than most. We are going to buy another like it, for his and hers cameras, since we often aren't in the same place at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!
Reviews.Author: mistressofstinge
Reviews.Content: We were in need of a good point and shoot camera that delivered the same high quality photos as our DSLR but that could be taken to places that don't allow our "detachable lens camera". This fit the bill. This camera is light, slender and has a solid feel to the body. It takes great photos and offers numerous options that are user friendly. The price was fantastic and much less that in the retail stores. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Wood
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased as a gift for my wife . It is easy to use and takes excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: For point and click users
Reviews.Author: Daigoo
Reviews.Content: This is a great point-and-click camera.  Great for the person that needs a picture in a jiffy and does not want to carry a bulky camera around.  When we print the pictures out, we cannot tell that it was from a point-and-click camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing !!!
Reviews.Author: AHMED
Reviews.Content: It is really amazing to know that a point and shoot camera is capable of.... It delivers stunning snap. Cool.....

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: I got this camera with a recommendation from a friend and am so happy with it--have been using it for my art and fun for almost a year and have recommended it to others

Reviews.Title: Great camera, lots of useful feature and so cheap
Reviews.Author: AntoineWojdyla
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I had bought the previous model in Tokyo and eventually lost it in San Fransicsco.It is the best point and shoot camera I ever had : it is light, small and even though the lens is not fantastic, the digital signal processing it offers allows you to make picture no other camera can do (I have a  Nikon D90 that cannot compare for night shot or high dynamic pictures).I love it !

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot camera
Reviews.Author: trvlrsdtra "trvlrsdtra"
Reviews.Content: This is a great compact camera with many shooting options. The pictures are crystal clear and sharp. I love this little camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Veena
Reviews.Content: Love this camera--beautiful, high quality pictures and really easy to use. Love the intelligent auto setting so that the camera adjusts settings based on what it recognizes in the frame (i.e. portrait, landscape, etc.). Fast shutter speed and great battery life..  The battery can be charged with a micro-USB which is easy as well.Also, the panoramic setting and 3-d filming is nice but not necessary. Great camera for a great price--the fact that is' the 2012 model doesn't make it a bad camera!

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: I haven't tried all the features yet, but the quality of pictures is outstanding, and the buttons are easy to use.  It's so nice to have a dedicated video button so going back and forth is as simple as taking another picture, no scrolling through options to get to it.  Also I like the fact that it zooms in on faces and auto-corrects unless you tell it not to.  I use it to take pictures of kids and they come out great, even back-lit.  The last good point to mention is that the charger has a USB port that plugs into a wall socket or into the computer or can be plugged into a car charger, just like a phone, so that's convenient.  All these are steps up from my previous camera which I got about five years ago.  What a difference from that one in quality and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: great camera!!
Reviews.Author: love it
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeds expectations. It is TINY. Also you cant beat the price at $104. competitors have a lot to live up to for a $100 camera. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: It is amazing
Reviews.Author: Diego Rosales
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, it has many functions and pictures have good quality. I like taking this everytime I travel.

Reviews.Title: Delighted
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am pleased all round with this purchase.Firstly I like the software which came loaded on the camera. After an automatic update from the website I have software which works with the camera well and also allowed me to register my camcorder and use the same software.The camera works great. It fires up quickly so I can take photos quickly.I have used a Sony DSC-P8 for some years and been very pleased with the results. However it was large by modern standards and only 3.2Mpixels.The WX50 is much smaller and fits into my shirt pocket easily. The photos are fine and compare well with the P8. The only complaint I have is that the zoom is too quick and difficult to control accurately.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money and amazing shots
Reviews.Author: Judy Genao "Judy"
Reviews.Content: I recommended this camera and so far the pictures come out great.Low lighting is also a plus just don't shake when taking the shot.Very easy and would recommend to any parents with kids.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Brooke Szelazek
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it's the first digital camera I've ever bought. Very easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Edison Albornoz
Reviews.Content: maravillosa cámara la recomiendo las fotos nocturnas geniales, el tiempo de entrega es muy bueno por el vendedor, la descripción de la cámara es tal cual como en la pagina

Reviews.Title: The features are endless....
Reviews.Author: hbackhoe
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe this many options come with this small price. I replaced a Lumix camera and the Sony is years ahead in features, great photos, too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: M Warnicke
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for a great price!  Lot's of fun options to play with and it's even able to keep up with our two toddlers :-)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Adam Buckman
Reviews.Content: I got this because i wanted a new camera that did full HD yes it may not be 1080p but I don't care.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Zach Beland "ZMB"
Reviews.Content: This camera is one of the best Point and Shoot cameras i've ever used! It is a 100% better than my old Nikon Coolpix S4000! By the way the Nikon was a bad camera. Would buy again if this one broke! Great price!

Reviews.Title: Works well for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Broughton
Reviews.Content: I was using this as a camcorder and it works well. It will record 720p video and 1080i video. The downside is that too many of the setting are not manual (if the company would unlock more of the features it would be 5 stars). The optics perform well and there is not too much distortion. Another downside it that the cmos sensor will sometimes do a rolling shutter on rapidly changing brightness.The pictures are clear and crisp.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Compact Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Arunjunai Naresh Varadharajan
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent compact, point and shoot camera, doesnt have much zoom, but it is good for compact model.Camera can he held in pant and shirt pockets and easy to carry.Has many good features that fits for this low bill.If you need compact and 5x zoom is enough for ur need, this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good camera
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: I went through Sony WX1 (lost) and WX5 (repair costs more than the price of WX50 due to my harsh abuse & lack of care) before finding WX50 which seems to beat other models on features and price. I like the WX series primarily for their low light picture taking ability, compact size and I almost never use zoom.Not sure how long this will last, but given the fate cameras suffered in my hands and the low cost of WX50, I'd say this fits perfectly now.

Reviews.Title: I Love it! So cute in black.
Reviews.Author: justcind "Cindy"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Sony Cybershot DSCWX50 16MP to replace the Nikon S01 that I returned after it broke. The Sony is not as small as the Nikon S01 (nothing is yet) but it was the lightest, smallest I could find with the best features. I absolutely love it! Having a multiple shot timer was a must for me and at first I thought this camera did not have that feature. After playing around with the settings I found it has a multi-shoot ability that also works in timer mode. That is soooo cool. So basically you can set the timer, run and get into position, and it will take a whole slew of pictures depending on how long you held the button. It also takes panoramic shots! After my Nikon camera broke and I read the bad reviews on this camera I purchased it at Target and I bought the Geek Squad warranty. I didn't even know Target had Geek Squad associates. They were great. So if anything goes wrong with it its covered. I looked at Best Buy first but their employees knew nothing about the cameras and they were totally annoying asking 20 times if they can help and then when you ask them something they have no idea. Sorry, I got a little off topic :)

Reviews.Title: The best camera I've ever had
Reviews.Author: rt1092
Reviews.Content: I'm not a tech savy camera buff. So if I can get it to work it must be easy.The pictures in all modes so far have come out great, Clear as a bell. It shoots the picture when you press the button not when it wants to.In movie mode you can shoot stills. By pressing the button.Colors seem lifelike.Battery life seems fine.Have not found any cons yet, except it's a little hard to see the screen in bright sunlight, But I just pointed and shot and the pics came out great.And sound is a little scratchy

Reviews.Title: Power button is a big problem
Reviews.Author: dbur
Reviews.Content: Whenever there is any pressure on the top of the camera near the power button it turns on or off.  You don't even have to actually touch the button.  It's always tuning on in my bag and then the battery is dead when I want to use it.  :-(The playback button is also another big problem.  Any touch and it turns on.  I mitigated the effect of these buttons some by sticking on a self adhesive piece of rubber with a hole in the middle that requires direct effort to penetrate and actuate the button.  This helps a lot.  They really should recess those buttons.Size is nice, which is why I bought it.  I need one to always carry with me but take no noticeable space.Takes a decent close up to about 1" away which was another feature I needed, but many low end cameras can do that now.Many other bell and whistle features, but I don't get into those too much.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "AMC"
Reviews.Content: Got my camera and was extremely pleased with it.  I would recommend it to anyone that wants great pics and small size that you can carry in your pocket.  Love, love it!!

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, and fast!
Reviews.Author: plumber
Reviews.Content: This Sony is a great camera for the price, pictures are very clear and the delay from when you push the button to it taking the picture is FAST! I bought this over the canon A2300 camera, which I bought for Christmas, and this is hands down way better. Night and day difference. The menu options are easy to use. This is a great buy for a point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX50 16.2 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom...
Reviews.Author: jeffsteele
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gfift, but my parents really seem to like it.  They say it switches from still photos to video with the touch of a button, and the qaulity is quite good.  For the price and available features, I don't think you couyld do any better.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: wtdsdd
Reviews.Content: This is a excellent camera, compact, easy to manipulate. The pictures are clear, even when in motion. It's fun to view the multi shots, almost like a movie. great for travelling.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Madhu
Reviews.Content: This is my first Sony digital camera that I ever bought. I was always been a Canon fan, but after breaking down my third Canon camera in a row, I do not want to buy Canon any more. I was always hesitant to buy Sony due to the memory card comparability. But this camera takes regular SD/SDHC cards, and I am glad that I bought it. I really like the powerful flash, faster shutter speed, great low light performance with in auto mode is a big plus. It is very compact, and yet has 5X zoom. I like the video smoothness as well. Can not expect anything more than these features for a point and shoot compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Tiny and helpful in everyday activity
Reviews.Author: ak
Reviews.Content: I was surprised of it size, really small, fits in hand.Image quality is good enough for everyday photos. Video is also good.Does not have any disadvantages comparing to similar products, or I just didn't noticed them.

Reviews.Title: Hector Pachay
Reviews.Author: Hector Pachay
Reviews.Content: La camara tiene buena calidad de imagen!!!! Los Felicitos por la responsabilidad que tienen con el comprador, sigan asi!!!!  Gracias

Reviews.Title: Lise
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I was torn between choosing a Canon or a Sony, but because I previously owned a Sony and was happy about it, I said eh, why not. I must say, this a pretty awesome camera. I did my research, but there wasn't too much on this camera when I bought it when it first came out. So I took a chance with it.When received it, I played around with it, and easy to use. The battery life is not bad, but I haven't done too much picture-taking recently.It has great features that are useful when you need, ie beach, portrait settings etc. It also has that feature where you can chose a "pop" of color (red, yellow, blue, and green are the only choices).I think the only thing I was bummed about was Macro/Micro features, my previous camera had the choice to chose if you wanted this feature on/off. But because its autofocus, it takes a little longer, and you have to figure out the distance and zoom you want to shoot.I haven't tried the "Smile" detection feature, I thought it was kind of weird, but I guess I have to try it out.

Reviews.Title: Warning - This product is not brand new!
Reviews.Author: Mital Patel
Reviews.Content: When I received the camera, the seal on the box had already been broken.  I took a couple photos and noticed that they were numbered beginning from "DSC00055".  A brand new camera would begin at "DSC00001".  The camera seems to be working fine, but I would have much rather gotten what I was advertised.

Reviews.Title: dissapointed!
Reviews.Author: DAVID GIGUIERE
Reviews.Content: battery needs constant re-charging, pictures are okay for a  inexpensive camera .... very disappointing to say the least! would not buy again!

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera outfit
Reviews.Author: South District "DelDOT S/D"
Reviews.Content: Can I just say I was totally amazed with the equipment I received with this package.  I hope a similar one will be available the next time we need to purchase a digital camera.  It saved so much time, not having to pick out case, memory card etc.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Upgrade from Previous Camera
Reviews.Author: Spikepace
Reviews.Content: Summary: easy to use because the automatic settings work wellThis camera replaced a Cyber-shot that I purchased a few years ago.  Compared to my previous camera, this DSC-WX50 is fantastic.  My favorite convenience is the automatic macro on/off.  I use this camera to document hardware at work, and that involves both wide views and close-ups.  The automatic settings detect the proximity of the object and then apply macro focus as needed (compared to manually setting this as I had to do with my previous camera).  This feature appears to be available on most newer cameras, however, and is not a special feature of this one.I found the battery life to be superb.  I took a photo survey of some equipment that involved acquiring about 90 consecutive photos with the view screen on and using the flash.  The flash was always ready right away following a photo, and the battery remained at full charge.I have had difficulty acquiring good panorama photos.  It is not clear how fast the camera should be turned during panorama mode.  There is a nice graphic on the display screen that indicates the required camera orientation and the direction in which to turn.  The (minor) problem is that the speed at which you turn affects the piecing together of the photo.  If you go far too fast or slow, then the acquisition will stop and you will receive a notice.  I have found that most of the time I think it is a good shot because it looks good on the display screen, but the actual photo (when viewed on a PC) clearly shows misaligned sections.  This is the first camera I have owned that has this feature, so I'm still having a blast playing with it and do not care that these misalignments are so common.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera if it chooses to work
Reviews.Author: Andreas Schneider
Reviews.Content: I have experienced the power on issue as others did, Remington and reinserting the battery works unless the battery drained  during the time of non usage. Having experiencing the nonsupport by Sony, I cut my losses and go back to Panasonic,

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Had high expectations for this camera, by the image quality is not good.  The pictures are not as crisp as my 8 year old canon.  Tried every setting but the photos always have a "painting" like look to them.  Maybe it's a Sony thing?

Reviews.Title: 3rd Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Sony Cyber shot in the past 10 years my one that I had before was 7 years old and the only reason I needed a new one was I lost it.  I went with cybershot again as it is a sturdy easy to use camera that has good capabilities for a point and shoot  have not really put this to a true test of taking pictures all day but a test run came out nice and I like the options.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: EricaB
Reviews.Content: I received my camera last Friday and I'm really satisfied so far. I've not examined all of the features but it does take lovely outdoor pictures. Definitely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Little Mama Mama
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price.  Small and compact, but still takes nice photos.  Still learning how to use the different bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: NICOLÁS DÍAZ
Reviews.Content: He was received in excellent condition. Made with high quality materials. I am very grateful and happy for your attention. Always know that I can count on you.

Reviews.Title: I do not know why they call it cybershot?!
Reviews.Author: shervin minaee
Reviews.Content: This camera looks fancy, but it is not cyber-shot...Actually if you take a picture from a moving object it will get to blurred!!!

Reviews.Title: pics ok
Reviews.Author: ca
Reviews.Content: It may very well be my photography ability, but this camera takes pictures that are nothing more than ordinary.  It fits the bill for a need for a camera, but if you are looking for something to take GREAT shots with, this is not the camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Beetowa
Reviews.Content: I've only had this little guy for a couple weeks, but I love it! It's about the same size as my cell phone and very portable without sacrificing quality. There are a ton of settings that I had to play around with first and I'm still getting the hang of it, but the pictures have great definition and color. I can't wait to travel with it!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This camera has many features including HD videos. Easy to use, the pictures turn out fantastic! So pleased that I purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: Really small so is nice for traveling
Reviews.Author: Catherine OConnor
Reviews.Content: Haven't used it, as is meant for a trip overseas we're taking soon.  The ratings on this camera were found to be excellent on more than one site for it's review, which for us, means it's worthy. Cost was a factor too, and the Cyber Shot is well within our budget limits.  When comparing this to other small camera's at Best Buy & Costso, the value is evident as competitor camera's range to be about 30-50% higher in price.  Am not very tech savvy so ease of use was important, and this camera fits this need.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic low-light camera
Reviews.Author: R. Cardosi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this specifically because I was looking for a point-and-shoot camera that would take decent pictures in low-light conditions.  I've had it for less than a week now, but I'm already very impressed!  I took some pictures in a dark room (with flash on) and I could see things better in the pictures than with my naked eyes!  I also tried taking video at night, and it looks fantastic!  The last camera I had was an Easyshare;  That took decent pictures in bright light, but in low-light conditions it left much to be desired.  This one performs beautifully even in the dark.  It's also thin and light weight.  I love it!  People have also posted video reviews of this camera on youtube.  Check out [...]

Reviews.Title: EUROPE NEVER LOOKED BETTER
Reviews.Author: D. Simpson "frankenstein"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera solely for a recent trip to Europe, particularly for the panoramic feature as I would be visiting the Alps and other natural views. Hands down the best camera I have ever owned or used. Certainly camera enthusiasts and professionals require a broader scope for their usage, but for the average, and even artistic photographer, this little Sony will not disappoint you at all. The price was perfectly affordable and I also purchased a 16 GB flash card, which stored plenty of shots.The camera is easy to use and light weight. Also quite aesthetically pleasing.The Zoom was perfectly acceptable as well. The only slight negative could be the battery life. After a full day of use (I typically turned the camera off when I knew I would not be shooting for a while--the camera also does this for you by shutting down after a time of non usage), the low battery light would appear as I was reviewing the days photos. But that's it.I would highly recommend this excellent camera!

Reviews.Title: sony wx50
Reviews.Author: Givi Amiridze
Reviews.Content: "Благодарю вас.) Доставлены в срок. Устройство Sony wx50 по соотношению цены и качества 5 +. Минусы кнопки небольшие (. HDMI вход неудобно., И ..., но я повторю цены и качества 5 +"

Reviews.Title: Sony Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Beth A. Essington
Reviews.Content: This item arrived fairly quickly, but not in very good condition. The ad said it just had cosmetic scratches. It was sent through the mail in a small box with one piece of balloon plastic on one side of it. When it arrived it had a crack across the top. I ordered it for a young friend and he says he'll keep it, but I think he was a little disappointed with the condition.

Reviews.Title: GREAT EVERYDAY USE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Miss Jess
Reviews.Content: This is no means is the best camera ive ever owned.. but its great i like the easy to use settings.. its so tiny (even with a case) you can put it in a small bag, purse or even pocket.. i love that.. takes pictures quickly i like that too and does great indoors :) i like the pictures outdoors better but i do with any camera so thats just a personal thing ive uploaded on the product pictures EVERYDAY USE PHOTOS IVE TAKEN! :) FROM THIS 2012 December... I hate always making judgements of a camera of people taking pictures of flowers and cars and buildings i want to see use of a camera that i would actually be taking photos of most often.. so wa la! uploads for everyone! :) make your own judgement if this camera is right for you :)

Reviews.Title: great little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Full Texan "Wildlifer"
Reviews.Content: The camera has a very fast shutter speed and I love that it recharges using my phone charger! Wish it had a better zoom, but it a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Maybe it's me?
Reviews.Author: Nathanielcatch
Reviews.Content: I love Sony product and they used to be a great company making great products. With this camera (and a few I looked at on display at Best Buy) I am saddened that the lens mechanism is not made better.PROS:Pretty much everything on this camera is great. Awesome low light, zoom, LCD size, battery life, picture quality, video quality, etc.CONS:Maybe it is me, but when I am shooting video and zooming at the same time I see the LCD screen moving left, right, up and down. I know that it is suppose to move in and out but when the video gets to your computer and you are trying to edit and the picture keeps going left and right it is a bit frustrating. I cannot be the only one that has experienced this or maybe I am the only one that cares because I use this camera for video.I have contacted Sony about this problem and had the lens replaced twice and the third time I sent the camera in they told me there was nothing wrong with it.

Reviews.Title: Good Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Ag
Reviews.Content: Good quality product. I recommend Beautifully presented and works perfectly. I expected when I thought about buying this product. Good very good

Reviews.Title: Realmente muito boa!
Reviews.Author: marcio
Reviews.Content: Camera perfeita para quem nao quer gastar $280 na tx10 qu filma embaixo d'agua e tambem quer uma camera full Hd.Cheia de efeitos e possibilidades.

Reviews.Title: Small size and price
Reviews.Author: Vasilios Vordonis "pireas"
Reviews.Content: Great futures if you learn all of them you can make great pictures only problem small flash for far away night photography

Reviews.Title: no detail
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: zoom in when taking picture or in review mode and it goes to a painted picture mode what happened to detail???????

Reviews.Title: I really wanted to love this camera......
Reviews.Author: DoubleSMom
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace my 7 year old, 6 megapixel cyber-shot. My old camera was a tank. It took great pictures for being so outdated and withstood many beatings from my toddler. The only reason I wanted to replace the camera was the lens cover would no longer open entirely on its own. I needed to push it open with my fingers and would often forget to do so, ruining my picture.I wanted to love this camera just as much, but I'm a little under-whelmed by the WX50. The special features are really cool, but honestly I'm not sure I will use them very often.Here is what I don't like about the camera:1.)It is made of plastic and feels like a feather in my hand. I realize this is how cameras are made now days, but I'm afraid it will break if dropped. I will do everything in my power to keep it away from my child.2.) I feel the colors are a tad off.3.) Most of the pictures come out blurry. This could very well be operator error or simply the fact that 99% of the pictures I'm taking are of a busy 18 month old that doesn't believe in sitting still for longer than 2 seconds. If you're reading this and know a solution to this problem, please share!!4.) On several occasions the camera would not turn on. I pushed the power button and nothing happened. I had to take the battery out for a few seconds and then the camera would turn on.Overall, the camera is okay and I would recommend it. It takes the pictures faster than my old cyber-shot. The images that come out clear are very sharp. Just be careful not to zoom in too far. Like I said earlier, I love the special effects. My dream is to own a DSLR, but its not in the budget right now. Maybe this dream is making my expectations too high for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Moment Distroyer
Reviews.Author: boy965

Reviews.Title: Every problem you've read in the reviews is in this camera. Read them all here!
Reviews.Author: A computer programmer user
Reviews.Content: The reason I got this camera is because its potential is really high. Unfortunately mine has some problems and yours will too...All my problems, but don't fret if you don't see yours in here! The internet has more info on it maybe!disclaimer: I am no professional. My solutions are what I did to make this camera work/ keep it working. Doing any of the following stuff puts everything at risk. My suggestion is to not do any of them, and work hard and buy a more expensive camera without these problems. If you still decide you like my solution and go forward with it, you're doing it at your own risk.1) the lens extender doesn't retract/close all the way when the camera is shut off.my solution was: turn camera on again and off again and hope it retracts all the wayNOT A SOLUTION: put any pressure on lens or force it down a little. This will break the super fragile camera forever and you probably can't get a new one from the warranty if you do. In fact don't even touch the lens or its extender or you'll likely break it. Not kidding.2.a) the lens is super fragile, one bump against the super fragile extended lens will break itmy solution was: treat it more cautiously than newborn baby. You can drop a baby and it will survive. This camera will not. ESPECIALLY if the lens is extended when the camera drops.2.b) the lens might extend in a travel case if its bumped too hard or if the button somehow gets hit. The super fragile gears in it and its motor can't handle that kind of strain and it will be ruined.my solution was: make your own case with an inside lining of bubble wrap to protect against short falls or approximately "leg high" accidental drops, so that there is no way the button will be hit... but IF it is hit anyway you have made your own case so that the lens can FULLY extend inside the case and won't touch anything anyway... Thus ensuring it won't break. <33) flash is worse than no flashmy solution was: learn to turn off flash. Its not that simple in the dark? Either use a flashlight or stop taking pictures with no light source...4.a) camera software doesn't install on my computer properly, ALSO my SD card doesn't work in my computer after it has been put in the camera and the camera was turned on with the card in it.my solution was: Tough luck chum, that is the future for you. Its not bad enough that things don't work on their own and break super easy. Now having them come into contact with each other breaks them. You have to scour the internet and figure out your problem. Sometimes its simple. It took me registry editing and about a week and a half of working 2-3 hours a day to fix mine. Here's another note. If you have a webcam on your laptop and you disable it or uninstall its software AND unhook it that could be part of the problem of why your camcorder won't install the software. Also remember to try different USB slots because that was another problem. Also get the software online and install it directly because, again, the camera wouldn't do it properly for me and just kept freezing my OS.4.b) My SD card still doesn't work? What the hell? This is a mountain of crap I already read through and I just want to take some simple freaking pictures?!! How do you rate this thing as 4 stars?!my solution was: Your SD card is probably 30mbs and type 6. Get a better one. Only the latest technology "works properly" when conjoined... and I use the words "works properly" veeeeeeery loosely. You bought a camera that takes amazing pictures and movies with surprisingly good audio. You knew "SOMETHING" wasn't right with the price when you bought it.5) I turned on my camera to take a quick picture to share with a friend and it wouldn't turn on? I bought this thing to take quick pictures?! It can't even do that?my solution was: about every 4th time this thing won't turn on... so just pop the battery out *super CAREFULLLY!!* so as not to drop the also super fragile battery which will break the thing with any significant fall on a weak spot, then pop the battery back in and there you go! Too bad you missed your chance to take that quick picture and the moment is gone now.my Solution #2: get a good camera-phone and use it for those kinds of pictures because this camera is too fragile to be handled so quickly, and can't be reliable for that kind of (catch the moment!) or (I only have a few seconds!) picture taking.Conclusion:Perfect poor-man's camera. Has a bunch of weaknesses that drive its price down in the market; but to someone who wants super quality for low-low-loooow price and will protect it like its your only child, and the child has a skin condition that lets it's flesh rend and tear with just a simple touch in the wrong spot kind of fragile child... lets call it super fragile paper thin plastic piece of Chinese crap... from any and all realistic-use-situation perspectives.PROS: super cheap super quality! all the bad things drive the price down into affordable for you! Woohoo!CONS: super ultra mega fragile with problems you have to constantly and I MEAN CONSTANTLY consider because they will break it sooooo easy fragile problems constantly never-blink!! I'm pretty sure just THINKING too hard will break it.(joking, but no... really...)Final words: Buy this because you want cheap camera with ultra quality and you'll babysit it better than your own child. Don't buy it for "quick pics", or "if you don't know how to edit your computer's registry", or "if you don't know what the difference between a 4 sd card and a 6 sd card", or "if you don't know how and/or don't have a program that can edit HD videos and records", or "if you don't know how to mess with deinterlacing", etc...Personally I love it and the pictures and the movies I get from it, but I expect it to break within 6 months from normal use/dust/electromagnetic interference from a common cellphone or something. One year warranty gets me another that hopefully doesn't arrive broken that will last me maybe 3 more months if I'm lucky.Hope my review helps! <3 love love and good luck! <3(~secretly I bought it to film arousing videos and artwork... *cough cough* pornography *cough!!* and I'm a bit saddened I can't risk letting fluids get on the lens sometimes, but the quality makes up for it~)

Reviews.Title: Lame, no memory card
Reviews.Author: Evan Williams
Reviews.Content: It's a digital camera! It's not a camera without a memory card, but doesn't come with one. Nowhere does it say, or imply, that none is included. Had to call Amazon after the fact to verify. Maybe I'm an idiot, but every digital camera I've purchased prior to this one had a memory card included. No wonder it was a good deal. What a scam.
